name: familienpilot-hamburg-mvp
description: Digital platform to streamline Kita-Gutschein and Elterngeld applications for Hamburg parents

scripts.types:generate: cd familienpilot && supabase gen types typescript --project-id $SUPABASE_PROJECT_ID > src/types/supabase.ts
scripts.gdpr:audit: echo 'Running GDPR compliance audit...' && node scripts/gdpr-audit.js
scripts.compliance:check: npm run gdpr:audit && npm run security:scan
